channel.title: Your Heart, My Integrated Circuit - industry city sleepers [Electronic, Alternative]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/your-heart-my-integrated-circuit
Been listening to a bit of Thom Yorke lately, I can tell it rubbed off a bit.
Some fun facts: This song was redone THREE times using three separate genres with three separate sets of samples. Couldn't make up my mind. This is a slower pace than the norm, 122bpm.
Comments, complaints and compliments welcome :slight_smile:

item.title: Your Heart, My Integrated Circuit - industry city sleepers [Electronic, Alternative]
